message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $95.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of making an offer of $85. I'm willing to pay that much for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $90. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Hi Alice, I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $87.50. Would you consider that?
